entry.title: Kellnr 6.0.1 release
entry.content:
Version 6.0.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • fix playwright version mismatch
  • update NPM packages
  • *(deps-dev)* bump eslint from 9.39.2 to 10.0.0 in /ui ([#1058]()) #1058
  • *(deps-dev)* bump eslint-plugin-vue from 10.7.0 to 10.8.0 in /ui ([#1056]()) #1056
  • *(deps-dev)* bump @eslint/js from 9.39.2 to 10.0.1 in /ui ([#1059]()) #1059
  • *(deps)* bump marked from 17.0.1 to 17.0.2 in /ui ([#1061]()) #1061
  • *(deps)* bump actions/checkout from 4 to 6 ([#1057]()) #1057
  • *(deps)* bump actions/setup-node from 4 to 6 ([#1055]()) #1055
  • *(deps)* bump vue from 3.5.27 to 3.5.28 in /ui ([#1060]()) #1060
  • *(deps)* bump clap from 4.5.54 to 4.5.58 ([#1062]()) #1062
  • *(deps)* bump syn from 2.0.114 to 2.0.115 ([#1063]()) #1063
  • *(deps)* bump testcontainers from 0.26.3 to 0.27.0 ([#1065]()) #1065
  • *(deps)* bump uuid from 1.19.0 to 1.21.0 ([#1066]()) #1066
  • *(config)* dedup config management and envvar mapping ([#1067]()) #1067
  • fix broken migration test
  • *(config)* dedup config management and envvar mapping
  • *(deps)* update npmDepsHash in flake.nix [dependabot skip]
  • *(deps)* bump uuid from 1.19.0 to 1.21.0
  • *(deps)* bump testcontainers from 0.26.3 to 0.27.0
  • *(deps)* update npmDepsHash in flake.nix [dependabot skip]
  • *(deps)* update npmDepsHash in flake.nix [dependabot skip]
  • *(deps)* bump syn from 2.0.114 to 2.0.115
  • *(deps)* update npmDepsHash in flake.nix [dependabot skip]
  • *(deps)* bump clap from 4.5.54 to 4.5.58
  • *(deps)* update npmDepsHash in flake.nix [dependabot skip]
  • *(deps)* bump marked from 17.0.1 to 17.0.2 in /ui
  • *(deps)* bump vue from 3.5.27 to 3.5.28 in /ui
  • *(deps-dev)* bump @eslint/js from 9.39.2 to 10.0.1 in /ui
  • *(deps)* bump actions/checkout from 4 to 6
  • *(deps-dev)* bump eslint from 9.39.2 to 10.0.0 in /ui
  • *(deps-dev)* bump eslint-plugin-vue from 10.7.0 to 10.8.0 in /ui
  • *(deps)* bump actions/setup-node from 4 to 6
  • Fix broken Windows build

Fixed:
  • non-admin user not able to open settings when auth_required = true #1070

entry.title: Kellnr 6.0.0 release
entry.content:
Version 6.0.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • add update-npm-hash command
  • add CLI for kellnr
  • add oauth2/openidconnect
  • don't show doc generation button in crate view if doc generation is disabled
  • add expand/collapse functionality in Startup Configuration ([#1019]()) #1019
  • improve display of config values in UI #1014
  • add test coverage
  • print Kellnr URL on startup ([#1011]()) #1011
  • add OpenAPI docs
  • add toolchain server ([#1009]()) #1009
  • add Windows builds

Fixed:
  • docs build endpoint not available for non-admin users
  • web-ui routing paths when origin.path is used ([#1023]()) #1023
  • make "nix build" more stable to package-lock.json changes
  • minor clippy issues ([#1027]()) #1027
  • oauth2 implementation ([#1022]()) #1022
  • remove default admin token #1012
  • admin user allowed to delete/lock himself #1015
  • don't show doc generation button in crate view if doc generation is disabled ([#1042]()) #1042

entry.title: Kellnr 6.0.0 Release
entry.content: Kellnr 6.0.0 brings a new CLI interface, OAuth2/OIDC authentication, and important configuration changes. This guide covers breaking changes and how to upgrade safely.

entry.title: Kellnr 5.14.1 release
entry.content:
Version 5.14.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • reuse reqwest client ([#984]()) #984

Fixed:
  • web UI open documentation link ignores kellnr origin path ([#985]()) #985

entry.title: Kellnr 5.14.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.14.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • promote user to admin ([#980]()) #980
  • redirect to auth tokens on /me ([#974]()) #974
  • add "pubtime" index field ([#970]()) #970

Changed:
  • improve performance of UI tests ([#981]()) #981
  • *(deps)* bump object_store from 0.13.0 to 0.13.1 ([#978]()) #978
  • *(deps)* bump time from 0.3.45 to 0.3.46 ([#979]()) #979
  • *(deps)* bump object_store from 0.13.0 to 0.13.1
  • *(deps)* bump time from 0.3.45 to 0.3.46
  • *(deps)* bump quote from 1.0.43 to 1.0.44 ([#975]()) #975
  • *(deps)* bump thiserror from 2.0.17 to 2.0.18 ([#976]()) #976
  • *(deps)* bump thiserror from 2.0.17 to 2.0.18
  • *(deps)* bump quote from 1.0.43 to 1.0.44
  • enforce fmt and no clippy warnings ([#973]()) #973
  • remove cargo-deny ([#972]()) #972
  • make UI code more maintainable ([#968]()) #968
  • move crate.io publish further up the pipeline

entry.title: Kellnr 5.13.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.13.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • improved UI ([#966]()) #966

Changed:
  • add workflow trigger
  • Merge branch 'main' of github.com:kellnr/kellnr
  • switch from release-plz to k-releaser ([#965]()) #965

entry.title: Kellnr 2025 - A Year in Review
entry.content: A look back at Kellnr's development in 2025: S3 storage, webhooks, new web interface, and contributions from 16 community members across 9 releases.

entry.title: Kellnr 5.12.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.12.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • feat: Make cards on frontpage clickable by @secana #964

Changed:
  • ci: Improve release-plz config by @secana #957
  • chore: Add .editorconfig for consistent coding styles by @nyurik #959
  • chore: Update Cargo.toml deps, clean up configuration by @nyurik #960
  • ci: Refactor YAML syntax for consistency and readability by @nyurik #958
  • test: Add playwright UI tests by @secana #963

entry.title: Kellnr 5.11.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.11.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • feat: Crate user only downloads not enforced when auth required = false by @secana #949
  • feat: Add allow_ownerless_crates setting by @maciekglowka #952
  • feat: Allow configuration of proxy URL and index #880 by @secana #954
  • feat: Configurable cookie signing key #928 by @secana #951
  • feat: Implement token cache, to relieve some pressure on db and in high throughput scenarios by @perfectra1n #953

Changed:
  • ci: Run the CI job only on pull by @secana #956

entry.title: Kellnr 5.10.1 release
entry.content:
Version 5.10.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • Update Rust Docker images
  • Update flake.nix

Fixed:
  • Broken crc dependency in lzma-rust2 crate
  • libstd not found on macOS

entry.title: Kellnr 5.10.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.10.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Show available crate groups in dropdown element in UI #929
  • addremove crate owners in UI #940

Changed:
  • pre compiled ui resources #917
  • Add pipeline to update website automatically #904
  • Add release-plz #908
  • replace-lua-tests-with-playwright #910
  • use `license` field and other Cargo.toml cleanups #912
  • Change license to MIT OR Apache-2.0 #919
  • bump syn from 2.0.111 to 2.0.112 #924
  • bump globals from 16.5.0 to 17.0.0 in /ui #925
  • format code and sort imports across multiple files #922
  • Prepare for crates.io publishing #926
  • bump rsa from 0.9.9 to 0.9.10 #927
  • Update sea-orm dependencies to latest rc #932
  • bump dependabot/fetch-metadata from 2.4.0 to 2.5.0 #933
  • bump url from 2.5.7 to 2.5.8 #934
  • bump toml from 0.9.10+spec-1.1.0 to 0.9.11+spec-1.1.0 #935
  • bump quote from 1.0.42 to 1.0.43 #936
  • bump syn from 2.0.113 to 2.0.114 #937
  • bump serde_json from 1.0.148 to 1.0.149 #938
  • publish to kellnr to cratesio #939
  • fix latest kellnr image resolve #941

entry.title: Kellnr 5.9.1 release
entry.content:
Version 5.9.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Fix wrong config and data directory path #902

entry.title: Kellnr 5.9.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.9.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Initial web-hook API to get events from kellnr #814
  • Kellnr is now a single binary that contains all required web resources to run #881

Changed:
  • All dependencies updated

Fixed:
  • Fix issue with sub-path hosting #862
  • Remove S3 default credentials #873

entry.title: Kellnr 5.8.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.8.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Allow S3 config with env-vars #833
  • Support for running kellnr on a URL sub-path #815

Changed:
  • All dependencies updated

Fixed:
  • Fix crate group user query #824

entry.title: Kellnr 5.7.1 release
entry.content:
Version 5.7.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Minimal Docker image for Kellnr that is optimized for size, but cannot build rustdocs. #797

Changed:
  • All dependencies updated

Fixed:
  • Added missing database indices on to speed up lookups for the crates.io proxy #800
  • Fixed broken docs queue list in web UI #807
  • Fixed caching issue for crates that led to the wrong version of docs being created. #786

entry.title: Kellnr 5.7.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.7.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Option download_on_update flag added. Allows kellnr to prefetch crate versions from crates.io #760
  • Support for Bearer Token authentication in addition to Basic Auth #773

Changed:
  • All dependencies updated

entry.title: Kellnr 5.6.1 release
entry.content:
Version 5.6.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Separate health route for health checks in e.g. Docker #756

entry.title: Kellnr 5.6.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.6.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Admin users can restrict what crates a user can upload. #671

Fixed:
  • Crate groups not fetched correctly in UI. #690

entry.title: Kellnr 5.5.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.5.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • New UI with better design and improved responsiveness

Fixed:
  • Store API tokens as hash values in the database

entry.title: Kellnr 5.4.1 release
entry.content:
Version 5.4.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Docs not building because crates are in wrong folder #670

entry.title: Kellnr 5.4.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.4.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • User groups to manage permissions for crates with groups instead of single users #649
  • S3 support for crate storage additional to the local storage #623
  • Required fields in Cargo.toml to deny crates with missing information #622
  • Read-only users that allow authenticated download of crates, but no upload. #601

Changed:
  • All dependencies

Fixed:
  • Wrong alignment of statistics cards on the landing page
  • Logout sometimes incomplete #602
  • Many smaller bugs

Removed:
  • Support for ARM v7 architecture. It conflicts with the new S3 feature.

entry.title: Testing Assembly Code with Rust
entry.content: Learn how to test inline assembly code in Rust applications using unit tests and integration testing strategies.

entry.title: Kellnr 5.3.1 release
entry.content:
Version 5.3.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Wrong version shown in web ui #583

entry.title: Kellnr 5.3.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.3.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Config and static directories are configurable #535
  • Support for download authentication #209
  • API endpoint to list all versions of a crate #576

Changed:
  • All dependencies

Fixed:
  • Empty user and password allowed #572
  • Missing crate description

entry.title: Kellnr 5.2.7 release
entry.content:
Version 5.2.7 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • All dependencies

entry.title: Kellnr 5.2.6 release
entry.content:
Version 5.2.6 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:

Fixed:
  • Cache invalidation if a crate is deleted #461
  • Return codes for the HTTP API #429

entry.title: Kellnr 5.2.5 release
entry.content:
Version 5.2.5 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Option max_db_connections to configure the max. concurrent database connections.

Changed:
  • All dependencies

Fixed:
  • Missing pkg-config and libssl-dev in Docker image.

entry.title: Kellnr 5.2.4 release
entry.content:
Version 5.2.4 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Static (musl) builds to support more Linux distributions

Changed:
  • Switched from Ubuntu as the builder to Cross-rs
  • Switched from Ubuntu as the Docker base image to the official Rust image
  • All dependencies

Fixed:
  • Permission denied on the docs build webpage

entry.title: Kellnr 5.2.3 release
entry.content:
Version 5.2.3 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Copy button for newly created tokens

Changed:
  • Use Ubuntu 24.04 as base image
  • Rust dependencies

Fixed:
  • Wrong computation of SHA256 for uploaded crates
  • Corrupt layer in Docker image

entry.title: Kellnr 5.2.2 release
entry.content:
Version 5.2.2 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • All crate and npm dependencies

Fixed:
  • Multiple small bug fixes.

entry.title: Kellnr 5.2.1 release
entry.content:
Version 5.2.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Option to mount certificates into the Docker #260
  • Responsive UI for mobile devices #238
  • Build docs with all features enabled #257

Changed:
  • static.crates.io used for faster downloads instead of crates.io #230
  • All crate and npm dependencies

Fixed:
  • Crates from crates.io are missing the version and documentation link in the UI after a search query #253

entry.title: Kellnr 5.2.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.2.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Switch to display and search cached crates in the UI
  • Delete button for all versions of a crate in the UI

Changed:
  • All crate and npm dependencies

entry.title: Kellnr 5.1.3 release
entry.content:
Version 5.1.3 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • New status code 4xx and 5xx used by crates.io: crates.io status codes

Fixed:
  • Docs and doc queue available in UI, even when auth is required

entry.title: Kellnr 5.1.2 release
entry.content:
Version 5.1.2 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Route for latest docs

Fixed:
  • Upload size for crates in settings not respected
  • Same folder for crates from Kellnr and crates.io

entry.title: Wrapping Cross-Platform Native Libraries in Rust
entry.content: Learn how a native shared C library is wrapped in a cross-platform Rust library and used in a cross-platform Rust application.

entry.title: Kellnr 5.1.1 release
entry.content:
Version 5.1.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Manual upload of rustdocs broken due to miscalculated upload size

entry.title: Kellnr 5.1.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.1.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • New landing page with statistics

Changed:
  • All dependencies

Fixed:
  • Username or password mismatch displayed as Internal Server Error

entry.title: Kellnr 5.0.0 release
entry.content: Version 5.0.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released. It switches from rocket.rs to axum, removes the git index support and has refactored settings.

entry.title: Kellnr 5.0.0 release
entry.content:
Version 5.0.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • Switch from rocket.rs to axum
  • Refactored settings

Removed:
  • Git index support

entry.title: Kellnr 4.0.3 release
entry.content:
Version 4.0.3 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • Updated dependencies

Fixed:
  • api_port_proxy not respected in config.json

entry.title: Kellnr 4.0.2 release
entry.content:
Version 4.0.2 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • From vue-cli to vite for the UI
  • Updated dependencies

Fixed:
  • Broken link to crates.io from dependencies

entry.title: Kellnr goes Open Source
entry.content: Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is now open source under the MIT license.

entry.title: Kellnr 4.0.1 release
entry.content:
Version 4.0.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Delete button in UI not working

entry.title: Kellnr 4.0.0 release
entry.content:
Version 4.0.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • Kellnr is now available as open-source under the MIT license
  • Moved Kellnr repository to Github - Kellnr
  • Moved Kellnr installer repository to Github - Kellnr Installer
  • Moved Kellnr helm repository to Github - Kellnr helm

entry.title: Kellnr 3.2.0 release
entry.content:
Version 3.2.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Removed license checks, Kellnr is fully free for commercial usage from now on
  • Postgresql now available as backend database, additional to sqlite
  • Authentication on pull now available in all Kellnr variants

entry.title: Kellnr 3.1.0 release
entry.content:
Version 3.1.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Initial support for authentication on pull RFC #3139
  • crates_io_num_threads allows to set the number of threads used to keep the crates.io index up-to-date
  • Flag git_index to disable the git index and only use the new sparse index

Changed:
  • The git index is disabled for new installations of kellnr per default

Fixed:
  • Missing (un)yank in database index

entry.title: Kellnr 3.0.1 release
entry.content:
Version 3.0.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • Update all dependencies
  • Switch to new license validation backend

Fixed:
  • Bug where the download number for uncommon crate names is counted incorrectly

entry.title: Leveraging the Type System for Domain Modeling in Rust
entry.content: Use domain modeling in Rust to achieve separation of concerns, code decoupling and a better understanding of your domain.

entry.title: Kellnr 3.0.0 release
entry.content:
Version 3.0.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Display readme of crate in the UI, if available
  • Stabilized HTTP (sparse) registry API. See Sparse Index Protocol

Changed:
  • New user interface with light and dark theme
  • Before upgrading, backup the current version of kellnr. For more information see: Backup

entry.title: Kellnr 3.0.0 Release
entry.content: Kellnr 3.0.0, the private rust registry, is released. This release includes a new UI and many improvements under the hood.

entry.title: Rust Supply Chain Security
entry.content: What are the security risks of using Rust in your supply chain and how to mitigate them.

entry.title: Kellnr 2.3.4 release
entry.content:
Version 2.3.4 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Error on publish where the config file cannot be found, if it is in an unexpected location is fixed

entry.title: Kellnr 2.3.3 release
entry.content:
Version 2.3.3 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Add max_crates_size and max_docs_size config values to allow bigger uploads

entry.title: Kellnr 2.3.2 release
entry.content:
Version 2.3.2 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Cache in UI for faster load times
  • Docker tags now released as Major, Major.Minor and Major.Minor.Patch

Fixed:
  • Crates were not ordered alphabetically in the UI
  • Crates not sorted by biggest version but last updated

entry.title: Kellnr 2.3.1 release
entry.content:
Version 2.3.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Crates published to Kellnr are listed in the UI but are not available in the index pulled by Cargo

entry.title: Kellnr 2.3.0 release
entry.content:
Version 2.3.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Adds license information in the admin settings view

entry.title: Kellnr 2.2.1 release
entry.content:
Version 2.2.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Better logging (more levels, different formats)

Changed:
  • The log levels changed. If you run into an error on startup, check the log levels in the documentation

Fixed:
  • High resource usage (CPU & RAM)
  • Stability issues with the crates.io index mirror

entry.title: Kellnr 2.2.0 release
entry.content:
Version 2.2.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • "Delete" button to remove crates from the index

entry.title: Kellnr 2.1.2 release
entry.content:
Version 2.1.2 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Fixes a bug where transitive dependencies are broken when crates are renamed

entry.title: Kellnr 2.1.1 release
entry.content:
Version 2.1.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Fixes a bug where the same crate is shown multiple times in the UI

entry.title: Kellnr 2.1.0 release
entry.content:
Version 2.1.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Add an in-memory cache for crate downloads. This takes load from the disk and reduces I/O

entry.title: Kellnr 2.0.0 release
entry.content:
Version 2.0.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Automatic rustdoc creation for uploaded crates. Flag "rustdoc_auto_gen" has to be set to true
  • Add function to trigger build of rustdocs from the UI for the owner of a crate
  • Add function to trigger a rebuild of the crates.io index from the UI if it got out-of-sync
  • The Docker version of Kellnr import TLS certificates on startup, if placed in a special folder. This allows Kellnr to trust its own certificate or another proxy
  • Helm chart added support for additional DNS servers to use, such that Kellnr is able to download from itself

Changed:
  • Kellnr is now compiled for Ubuntu 22.04 LTS instead of 20.04 LTS

Fixed:
  • Page reload for the first added user fixed

entry.title: Asynchronous Closures in Rust - Box and Pin
entry.content: Understand asynchronous closures in Rust and how they relate to Box and Pin.

entry.title: Kellnr 1.6.0 release
entry.content:
Version 1.6.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • HTTP API support to pull crates (currently in cargo-nightly)

Changed:
  • New UI styling

Fixed:
  • Stability issues

entry.title: Kellnr 1.5.2 release
entry.content:
Version 1.5.2 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • New config flag api_port_proxy. Allows Kellnr to be run with a proxy that has a different port than Kellnr itself

entry.title: Kellnr 1.5.1 release
entry.content:
Version 1.5.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Changed:
  • UI components

Fixed:
  • Stability issues

entry.title: Kellnr 1.4.2 release
entry.content:
Version 1.4.2 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Overview UI for crates

Fixed:
  • Parsing of features on crate publish
  • Allow arbitrary badges

entry.title: Kellnr 1.4.1 release
entry.content:
Version 1.4.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Broken docs link when a crate has a hyphen in the name

entry.title: Kellnr 1.4.0 release
entry.content:
Version 1.4.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Kellnr can now proxy and cache crates.io
  • Fully async IO API for better performance
  • Settings can only be changed in the config file or per environment variable
  • Settings shows current startup config
  • Support https as the protocol if a reverse-proxy provides TLS
  • Helm Chart added support for TLS certificates

Removed:
  • Changing the setting with the UI was removed

entry.title: Kellnr 1.3.0 release
entry.content:
Version 1.3.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Less strict license checks
  • New license backend

entry.title: Kellnr 1.2.1 release
entry.content:
Version 1.2.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Fixed:
  • Version not correctly shown in UI fixed

entry.title: Kellnr 1.2.0 release
entry.content:
Version 1.2.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Multiarch Docker image
  • Added support for ARMv7 additional to AARCH64 and AMD64
  • Performance improvements through fully async API

entry.title: WebAssembly Compiler - Building a Runtime
entry.content: Write a WebAssembly runtime in Rust that can execute WebAssembly modules.

entry.title: WebAssembly Compiler - Building a Compiler
entry.content: Write a compiler in Rust to compile a WebAssembly AST to binary.

entry.title: WebAssembly Compiler - Building a Parser
entry.content: Write a parser in Rust for the WebAssembly text format.

entry.title: WebAssembly Compiler - Text format and AST
entry.content: Understand and parse a WebAssembly abstract-syntax-tree (AST) using Rust.

entry.title: Kellnr 1.1.1 release
entry.content:
Version 1.1.1 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Improved UI for low resolution displays

Fixed:
  • Bug in statistics web interface

entry.title: Kellnr 1.1.0 release
entry.content:
Version 1.1.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Statistics panel on web interface
  • Number of unique crates
  • Number of unique versions
  • Number of total crate downloads
  • Top three downloaded crates
  • Dark mode for the web interface

entry.title: Improve Rust compile times with sccache
entry.content: Improve build times by utilizing sccache and S3 to cache compilation results over multiple builds in your Rust CI/CD pipeline.

entry.title: Kellnr 1.0.0 release
entry.content:
Version 1.0.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released.
Added:
  • Full implementation of the private registry API for Cargo (push & pull crates)
  • Authentication and authorization
  • Search & filter for crates
  • Show information about a crate
  • Host rustdocs directly besides the crate
  • ARM aarch64 and Intel x64 support
